channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Failed tarmac over service trench., 16th December
item.description:
On roundabout outside the one stop shop/ subway. In front of entrance to roundabout from Ermin Street. The particular low spot is where two service trenches meet.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Crosshands Roundabout, Brockworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tank trap, a danger to life, 16th December
item.description:
This is a very large hole in the road, and a danger to life for cyclists. its been repaired before, but had no sealant road the edges and has opened up big time. Can you get the contractors to actually fix the section of road rather than the normal ridiculous quick fix that then costs the council more money when its fixed ( or not ) time and tine again.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 4, Bethesda Street, Montpellier, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Went over handle bars on my bike - a danger to life, 16th December
item.description:
This is more like a tank trap, I reported it on Friday 12th after hitting it in the dark and going over my bike handle bars and landing in front of a car. I spent the weekend nursing bruises and cuts. it's lethal and needs immediate attention.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Mead Road, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects -CW6 Potholes problem, 16th December
item.description:
15db Pothole CW 500x400x45mm Road closure X 1 NSD (CW6 Pothole)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A pothole in road problem, 16th December
item.description:
Pothole 1 metre long and 2 foot/70cm and wide 8cm deep at it's deepest. 30-40cm away from the kerb. Customer is worried as the tarmac all over the carriageway and can skid on it. Drivers are swerving into the opposite side of the carriage, just before the brow of the hill.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects -CW6 Potholes problem, 16th December
item.description:
Pothole CW 400x400x60mm Road closure (CW6 Pothole)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Surface water prevents use of crossing, 16th December
item.description:
Despite the crossing being new, no thought appears to have been given to water drainage. Currently the crossing is flooded, with the puddle stretching from the junction of Wellington Road and Evesham Road to about 20ft towards Pittville Lawn.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Wellington Road, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked drain causing flooded road, 16th December
item.description:
Blocked drain outside Roseville house on Main Road in Shurdington GL51 4XF. Damaging pavement, traffic hazard and creating difficulty for pedestrians getting soaked by bow waves from cars driving through flood water. Thank you
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Shurdington Road, Shurdington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
